lyrics:
69 contributorstranslationsportuguêsfrançaisdecode lyricsverse 1
how can i decide whats right
when youre clouding up my mind
i cant win your losing fight
all the time
nor can i ever own whats mine
when youre always taking sides
but you wont take away my pride

no not this time
not this time

chorus
how did we get here
when i used to know you so well
but how did we get here
well i think i know

verse 2
the truth is hiding in your eyes
and its hanging on your tongue
just boiling in my blood
but you think that i cant see
what kind of man that you are
if youre a man at all
well i will figure this one out
see paramore liveget tickets as low as 211you might also likeprechorus
on my own im screaming i love you so
on my own but my thoughts you cant decode

chorus

when i used to know you so well yeah
how did we get here
well i think i know

bridge

weve gone and made such fools of ourselves
do you see what weve done

breakdown

hey

chorus
how did we get here
when i used to know you so well yeah yeah yeah

i think i know

i see in you
